page.title: 17STANCLIFFE SCHOOLBOY
page.content: We rise at seven o'clock each morning and after a quick wash we get dressed.At ten to eight we go downstairs for breakfast.Day-children must be at school by eight thirty to attend chapel. Lessons begin at quarter to nine.We have five forty minute lessons and inbetween we have a fifty-five minute break.At one o'clock we have lunch and lessons begin again at ten past two after a short rest period. After two lessons we begin games at half past three.Depending on what day it is the boys either swim,play cricket or rounders.The girls play netball,tennis or rounders.The afternoon timetable is different in the winter and spring terms,games begin at five past two with lessons at four o'clock.For the boys the games in winter are football and rugby.
